questions.question_text: A company has completed its annual strategic planning session. As a result, several related projects, which will achieve the company's technological improvement goals, are identified. Which of the following BEST describes these projects?

discussion.content: A group of PROJECTS makes up a PROGRAM and all of the organization programs makes a PORTFOLIO. So the answer should be Portfolio.

Come on guys. This is probably one of the first things we learned about in project management, the difference between a program and portfolio. This is clearly a program. RELATED projects. Iâ€™d suggest some of you go relearn the material.
A program can be a group of loosely-related projects. However a portfolio is a collection of projects/programs that strive to achieve some kind of strategic initiative.
It is Program. "several related projects, which will achieve the company's technological improvement goals". Several related projects = Program. Multiple projects make up a program.

Selected Answer: A
It should be Portfolio

questions.question_text:
A project in the execution phase is over budget, and tasks on the critical path are on schedule.
Which of the following should the project manager do NEXT?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Since the project is over budget, it is necessary to take corrective action to address this issue. Issuing a change request is an appropriate step to take in order to formally request changes to the project scope, schedule, or budget, and to assess the impact of those changes on the project baseline. Updating the project management plan, revising the project charter, and evaluating the impact to the baseline may also be necessary, but these steps would typically follow the issuance of a change request.

Since the project is over budget, the next step the project manager should take is to evaluate the impact to the baseline. Therefore, option D is the correct answer.

The project baseline is the approved project plan that includes the scope, schedule, and budget. When the project is over budget, the project manager needs to determine the cause of the variance and evaluate the impact to the baseline. This evaluation will help the project manager determine the necessary actions to take to bring the project back on track.

choices.D: Evaluate the impact to the baseline.

discussion.content:
D

Estimating the work package should be done after the project team has identified all the tasks needed to create the project deliverables and grouped them into work packages covering all project scope.

A work package is a group of related tasks that are identified and planned together as a single unit of work. Once the work packages have been identified, the next step is to estimate the effort and duration required to complete each work package.

Selected Answer: A
A. Identify task relationships

The Work Package has been completed (according to the question). The next step is to identify the relationships between activities.

Source: CompTIA Student Guide PK0-004 Edition 2.0

questions.question_text: The project team has identified all the tasks needed to create project deliverables and grouped them into work packages covering all project scope. Which of the following should be done NEXT?

The project manager is running a project in an organization with a strong PMO and a mature control process. Due to vendor delays, the project is scheduled to exceed the authorized timeline. The project manager has discovered that fast-tracking two tasks will mitigate the issue. Which of the following should the project manager do NEXT?

discussion.content:
D is correct.. It's the only available selection.

 The project manager should take the following steps:

-Evaluate the impact of the fast-tracking
-Communicate with the stakeholders
-Obtain approval: The project manager should obtain approval from the project sponsor and PMO before implementing any changes to the project plan. This includes obtaining approval for any changes to the scope, schedule, budget, or quality of the project.
-Implement the fast-tracking
-Monitor and control the project

Selected Answer: C
This is C

choices.A: Announce the fast track to the project team.

questions.question_text: The government wants to start a project that will launch a satellite but lacks the appropriate SMEs. Which of the following would be BEST to solicit vendors?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
A Request for Quote (RFQ) is commonly used when deliverables are commodities for which
there are clear specifications and when price will be the primary determining factor. Unlike a
Request for Bid (RFB), this solicited price quote is used for comparison purposes and is not a
formal bid for work. Negotiation of price is generally not associated with an RFQ.
The government has approved vendors. RFQ is sent out to those.
